languages.text: "Желанная узким кругом лиц друкарская зверюшка. Вы бы видели, как искушенные борются за нее на тайных аукционах — в дело идет все: золото, подкупы, мечи. Забавно, правда, что гордого владельца этой твари после аукциона обычно никто больше и не видит. Зато сколько ценных бумаг и золота можно вытрясти за одну только особь..."

traits.locale_text: "Желанная узким кругом лиц друкарская зверюшка. Вы бы видели, как искушенные борются за нее на тайных аукционах — в дело идет все: золото, подкупы, мечи. Забавно, правда, что гордого владельца этой твари после аукциона обычно никто больше и не видит. Зато сколько ценных бумаг и золота можно вытрясти за одну только особь..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."
languages.original_text: "Желанная узким кругом лиц друкарская зверюшка. Вы бы видели, как искушенные борются за нее на тайных аукционах — в дело идет все: золото, подкупы, мечи. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “是黑暗灵族小小的宠物，一部分人对这些东西会梦寐以求。你真应该看看那些精于世故的人是怎么在秘密拍卖会上互相争夺的。为了得到这些东西，那些人会不择手段，无论是金钱、贿赂还是刀剑。不过，等拍卖会结束之后，人们通常都再也见不到那位得意洋洋的新主人了，这还真挺有意思的。不过，想想看吧，这些东西可以从别人身上榨出来多少黄金与证券……”
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: “是黑暗灵族小小的宠物，一部分人对这些东西会梦寐以求。你真应该看看那些精于世故的人是怎么在秘密拍卖会上互相争夺的。为了得到这些东西，那些人会不择手段，无论是金钱、贿赂还是刀剑。不过，等拍卖会结束之后，人们通常都再也见不到那位得意洋洋的新主人了，这还真挺有意思的。不过，想想看吧，这些东西可以从别人身上榨出来多少黄金与证券……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Una pequeña bestia Drukhari codiciada por un grupo selecto de gente. Debería ver cómo se pelean los más sofisticados para hacerse con esas cosas en sus subastas secretas: usan todo lo que haga falta, ya sea oro, sobornos o armas. Y también tiene gracia que no se suela volver a ver a quien acaba ganando. Pero piense en la cantidad de oro y beneficios que podría sacarle a alguien a cambio de una de ellas...».
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: «Una pequeña bestia Drukhari codiciada por un grupo selecto de gente. Debería ver cómo se pelean los más sofisticados para hacerse con esas cosas en sus subastas secretas: usan todo lo que haga falta, ya sea oro, sobornos o armas. Y también tiene gracia que no se suela volver a ver a quien acaba ganando. Pero piense en la cantidad de oro y beneficios que podría sacarle a alguien a cambio de una de ellas...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「デュカーリの小さい獣が上流社会の面々に求められてるのか。お上品なヤツらがこんなものを秘密のオークションで競って求める様は見物だよ――手に入れるためなら手段は選ばないんだろうね。金、賄賂、剣といった具合にさ。それと、プライドの高い新しい飼い主がオークションの後にたいてい姿を消しちまうってのおかしな話だ。でも、この金と警備をこんな商品の1点のために誰かから絞り出してこれるとはね…」
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリの小さい獣が上流社会の面々に求められてるのか。お上品なヤツらがこんなものを秘密のオークションで競って求める様は見物だよ――手に入れるためなら手段は選ばないんだろうね。金、賄賂、剣といった具合にさ。それと、プライドの高い新しい飼い主がオークションの後にたいてい姿を消しちまうってのおかしな話だ。でも、この金と警備をこんな商品の1点のために誰かから絞り出してこれるとはね…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Une petite créature drukhari très recherchée par les membres d'un certain cercle. Vous devriez voir les méthodes employées par ces gens sophistiqués pour en remporter une lors d'enchères secrètes. Ils sont prêts à tout : or, pots-de-vin, lames... Ce qui est amusant, si je puis dire, c'est que le nouveau propriétaire de l'animal a une fâcheuse tendance à disparaître suite à son acquisition. Mais pensez un instant à toutes les richesses que vous pourriez extorquer à quelqu'un pour l'une de ces créatures... »
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: « Une petite créature drukhari très recherchée par les membres d'un certain cercle. Vous devriez voir les méthodes employées par ces gens sophistiqués pour en remporter une lors d'enchères secrètes. Ils sont prêts à tout : or, pots-de-vin, lames... Ce qui est amusant, si je puis dire, c'est que le nouveau propriétaire de l'animal a une fâcheuse tendance à disparaître suite à son acquisition. Mais pensez un instant à toutes les richesses que vous pourriez extorquer à quelqu'un pour l'une de ces créatures... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ein kleines Drukhari-Ungeheuer, das von einem kleinen Personenkreis verehrt wird. Ihr solltet sehen, wie kluge Leute bei geheimen Auktionen um diese Dinger kämpfen – sie benutzen alles, um eins zu kriegen: Gold, Bestechung, das Schwert. Und vermutlich ist es witzig, wenn der stolze neue Eigentümer der Kreatur nach der Auktion meistens nie wieder gesehen wird. Aber bedenkt nur, wie viele Gold und Sicherheiten man für so ein Ding aus jemandem herauspressen könnte ..."
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: "Ein kleines Drukhari-Ungeheuer, das von einem kleinen Personenkreis verehrt wird. Ihr solltet sehen, wie kluge Leute bei geheimen Auktionen um diese Dinger kämpfen – sie benutzen alles, um eins zu kriegen: Gold, Bestechung, das Schwert. Aber bedenkt nur, wie viele Gold und Sicherheiten man für so ein Ding aus jemandem herauspressen könnte ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Seçkin bir insan topluluğunun gıpta ettiği, küçük bir Drukhari canavarı. Gizli açık artırmalarda sofistike kişilerin bunlardan birini kazanmak için nasıl kavga ettiğini görmelisin. Bir tanesini ellerine geçirmek için her şeylerini ortaya koyuyorlar. Altın, rüşvet, kılıçlar, ne ararsan. Yaratığı aldıktan sonra gururlu sahibinin bir daha o ortamlarda görünmemesi de biraz komik. Fakat bunlardan biri için alabileceğin onca altını ve parayı düşünsene..."
languages.original_text: "A little Drukhari beast coveted by a select circle of people. You should see how sophisticated folks fight to win these things at secret auctions — they'll use anything to get one: gold, bribes, swords. And I suppose it is funny when the proud new owner of the creature isn't usually seen again after the auction. But just think of all the gold and securities you could squeeze out of someone for one of these things..."

traits.locale_text: "Seçkin bir insan topluluğunun gıpta ettiği, küçük bir Drukhari canavarı. Gizli açık artırmalarda sofistike kişilerin bunlardan birini kazanmak için nasıl kavga ettiğini görmelisin. Bir tanesini ellerine geçirmek için her şeylerini ortaya koyuyorlar. Altın, rüşvet, kılıçlar, ne ararsan. Gururlu yeni sahibin, yaratığı aldıktan sonra bir daha açık artırmaya genelde katılmaması da biraz komik. Fakat bunlardan bir tanesi için birinden alabileceğin onca altını ve parayı düşünsene..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
